title: Data-Driven Learning Course for Stainless Steel Tensile Strength Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and foundational understanding of materials science concepts
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment emphasizing hands-on practice, with data analysis tool training using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can perform visualization and exploratory data analysis (EDA) of stainless steel tensile strength data using Streamlit-based tools.
Learners can analyze the correlation between chemical composition, heat treatment conditions, and tensile strength using 3D visualization techniques.
Learners can build optimized tensile strength prediction models by applying Decision Tree, Random Forest, and Artificial Neural Network (ANN) models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
